_header: Hail Saint Michael with long spear
_description: A satire on the people of Kildare — twenty 6-line stanzas (aabcdd)

BLHar913.First Lines:
Hail seint michel wiþ þe lange sperfair be þi winges
                    upon þi scholder…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…þis song if ye seid of meEuer iblessid mot ȝe
                    be
BLHar913.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript in London,  British Library Addit. 20091, ff.
                    65-73.
